items.content_html: I wrote a small library for formatting dates in Python using Moment.js like formatting: gist.github.com/myles/a17…. Useful if you want to integrate Python and Obsidian’s date and time formatting.

items.content_html:
So You Want to Turn an Office Building Into a Home?

Interesting article about the conversion of office buildings into aparments, one of the hurdles is the footprint of office buildings have been getting larger.

Interesting article about the conversion of office buildings into aparments, one of the hurdles is the footprint of office buildings have been getting larger.

items.content_html: I’m kind of obsessed with this zoo in Sweden where 7 of their chimps have escaped and are trying to take over the zoo. The ring leader, Santino, has a pervious history of uprising when he lead his troop in a previous revolt by throwing rock at the zoo visitors.
items.content_text: I’m kind of obsessed with this zoo in [Sweden where 7 of their chimps have escaped and are trying to take over the zoo](https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/dec/14/three-chimpanzees-shot-dead-after-escape-from-swedish-zoo). The ring leader, Santino, has a pervious history of uprising when he lead his troop in a previous revolt by throwing rock at the zoo visitors.

items.content_html: Snazzy Labs has an awesome video demoing Apple’s Tools to repair an iPhone 12 Mini. The simple repair, replacing the battery and fixing a broken screen, requires 44kg of tools shipped in two pelican cases. It’s incredibly overkill.
items.content_text: Snazzy Labs has an awesome video demoing [Apple’s Tools to repair an iPhone 12 Mini](https://youtu.be/hhdcbyIoFDU). The simple repair, replacing the battery and fixing a broken screen, requires 44kg of tools shipped in two pelican cases. It’s incredibly overkill.

items.content_html: This whole TikTok acquisition is reminding me of when Flip Video got bought by Cisco and shut down two years later. I really miss my FlipCam 💔.
items.content_text: This [whole TikTok acquisition](https://www.wsj.com/articles/microsoft-drops-out-of-bidding-for-tiktoks-u-s-operations-11600039821 "Oracle Wins Bid for TikTok in U.S., Beating Microsoft") is reminding me of when Flip Video got bought by Cisco and shut down two years later. I really miss my FlipCam 💔.
